commit message: Moved Rhymer and Thesaurus classes to a common rt package
Fix bug where selecting a suggested search term didn't trigger the serach
Rework the layout of the result list fragment
Issue #4: add possibility to lookup a word from the Reader tab.

Issue #4: Use a PopupMenu instead of an ActionMode to lookup a word from the Reader.

The ActionMode is intended for actions which modify the content.
